mapper.select: select cardCode, cardNumber, cardName, cardSortation, status, memo, companyCode from cards
select cardCode, cardNumber, cardName, cardSortation, status, memo, companyCode from cards where cardCode = #{cardCode}
select cardCode, cardNumber, cardName, cardSortation, status, memo, companyCode from cards where cardNumber like '%' || #{cardNumber} || '%' or cardName like '%' || #{cardName} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into cards (cardCode, cardNumber, cardName, cardSortation,status ,memo ,companyCode) values (#{cardCode}, #{cardNumber}, #{cardName}, #{cardSortation},#{status},#{memo},#{companyCode})
